description.value:
Frequency once per hour

You spend 10 minutes opening yourself to the mysteries of the multiverse by peering across different timelines or analyzing probability simulations. You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Augury], except you learn only about the dangers ahead; any results of "good" are instead "nothing," and results of "mixed" are instead "bad."

If you're legendary in Arcana or Occultism, you take only 1 minute to Predict Outcome.
